short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Think fast or lose in the 5 Second Battle!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
5 Second Battle is an adrenaline-pumping, rapid-fire game that puts your quick thinking and reflexes to the test.

Get ready to face a barrage of challenging questions and see if you can come up with the right answers in just 5 seconds! With a ticking timer adding to the pressure, you'll need to rely on your instincts and lightning-fast decision-making skills to stay in the game.

Think fast, stay sharp, and prove your mental agility as you race against the clock in this exhilarating and addictive challenge. Can you beat the 5-second rule?
